sentences.en: All the signs and announcements were rendered in English and Spanish.
sentences.cn: 所有的指示标志和公告都被译成了英语和西班牙语。

sentences.en: Asked what English he knew, Mr Semko rattled off "One, two, three"
sentences.cn: 问他懂哪些英文词，塞姆科先生不假思索地回答：“一，二，三。”

sentences.en: Do you speak English?
sentences.cn: 你会说英语吗？

sentences.en: English grammar
sentences.cn: 英语语法

sentences.en: English has hurt me a thousand times, but I still regard it as my first love.
sentences.cn: 英语伤我千百遍，我待英语如初恋。

sentences.en: He asked in his Germanic English if I was enjoying France.
sentences.cn: 他操着一口带有德国腔的英语问我在法国玩得是否愉快。

sentences.en: He discoursed for several hours on French and English prose.
sentences.cn: 他花了几个小时讲述法国和英国的散文。

sentences.en: He is the finest stylist in the English language of today.
sentences.cn: 他是当今英语世界中文采最好的。

sentences.en: He spoke no English and was completely silent during the visit.
sentences.cn: 他不会说英语，参观过程中一言未发。

sentences.en: He uses tapes of this program to teach English.
sentences.cn: 他用这个节目的录像带教授英语。

sentences.en: I think English men are very polite and very correct.
sentences.cn: 我认为英国人很有礼貌，举止非常得体。

sentences.en: leaflets written in plain English
sentences.cn: 用简单英语写的传单

sentences.en: Pressure appears to be mounting for conformity in how people speak English.
sentences.cn: 要求人们讲规范英语的压力似乎越来越大。

sentences.en: Sonia might not speak the English language well, but then who did?
sentences.cn: 索尼娅的英语也许说得不好，但谁又说得好呢？

sentences.en: Teddy clucked his tongue like a disapproving English matron.
sentences.cn: 特迪咂了咂舌头，活像个不以为然的英国女舍监。

sentences.en: the English countryside
sentences.cn: 英格兰乡村

sentences.en: The papers in maths and English are very testing.
sentences.cn: 数学试卷和英语试卷很难。

sentences.en: under English law
sentences.cn: 按照英格兰法律

sentences.en: While her English was correct, it was peppered with French phrases.
sentences.cn: 她的英语语法上没错，但是里面夹杂着很多法语短语。

sentences.en: Why are Geography, Drama, Art and English in the ascendant?
sentences.cn: 为什么地理、戏剧、艺术和英语逐渐受宠？

words.tran_cn: 英文的；英国的；英国人的
英语；英文；英国人；英格兰人

trans.tran_cn: 英格兰的，英国的，英语的，英格兰人的
trans.tran_en: relating to England or its people
the language used in Britain, the US, Australia, and some other countries
the language used in Britain, the US, Australia, and some other countries
